TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorLookupTableEffect extends System.Drawing.Imaging.Effects.Effect

Docs.summary: Modifies the color components of an image.
Docs.remarks: Individual color component values are changed to entries in a series of lookup tables.

Docs.param: The lookup table for the red channel.
The lookup table for the green channel.
The lookup table for the blue channel.
The lookup table for the alpha channel.
Docs.summary: Creates a new with the specified red, green, blue, and alpha lookup tables.
Docs.exception: A lookup table parameter is longer than 256 bytes.
